Text:
Buy the book as well!
We need to create a little hype around our own Puffy!

FANTASTIC TORRENT!

Thanks so much nomz for making this available, after previewing in PDF I fully intend to purchase a hard copy from them!

Did the same thing when I previewed Absolute OpenBSD on here as well, people that say file sharing doesn't help with promotion and hurts real world sales are clearly idiots!
